description:
Meet Clara and her brave friends: Pepe, the proud rooster; Lola, the enthusiastic chick; and Tico, the imaginative little chick.

One morning, Clara discovers a golden egg in her nest, an object as fascinating as it is mysterious. The egg's appearance sets off a series of events that lead our heroes to embark on a quest full of surprises, dangers, and discoveries.

In this adventure, Clara and her friends will learn valuable lessons about friendship, courage, and unity. The novel is full of exciting moments, endearing characters, and magical settings.
name: Chicken Party: Animal Farm
